verses.text: And thou, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee a \w sharp|strong="H2299"\w* \w knife|strong="H2719"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee a \w barber’s|strong="H1532"\w* \w razor|strong="H8593"\w*, and cause \add it\add* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* upon thine \w head|strong="H7218"\w* and upon thy \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*: then \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee \w balances|strong="H3976"\w* to \w weigh|strong="H4948"\w*, and \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* the \add hair\add*.

Thou shalt \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0217"\w* a third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, when the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w siege|strong="H4692"\w* are \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w*: and thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a third \w part|strong="H7992"\w*, \add and\add* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* it with a \w knife|strong="H2719"\w*: and a third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* thou shalt \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* in the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*; and I will draw \w out|strong="H7324"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them.

Thou shalt also \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thereof a \w few|strong="H4592"\w* in \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, and \w bind|strong="H6696"\w* them in thy \w skirts|strong="H3671"\w*.\f + \fr 5.3 \ft skirts: Heb. wings\f*

Then take of them \w again|strong="H3947"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* them into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* them in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; \add for\add* thereof shall a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; This \add is\add* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: I have \w set|strong="H7760"\w* it in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* and \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* \add that are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* her.

And she hath \w changed|strong="H4784"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* into \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* more than the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* more than the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* that \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* her: for they have \w refused|strong="H3988"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* and my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, they have not \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in them.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because ye \w multiplied|strong="H1995"\w* more than the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* you, \add and\add* have not \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, neither have \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, neither have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* according to the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* you;

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I, even I, \add am\add* against thee, and will \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

And I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in thee that which I have not \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, and whereunto I will not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* any more the like, \w because|strong="H3282"\w* of all thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.

Therefore the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee, and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; and I will \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* in thee, and the whole \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of thee will I \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* into all the \w winds|strong="H7307"\w*.

Wherefore, \add as\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Surely, because thou hast \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* with all thy detestable \w things|strong="H8251"\w*, and with all thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, therefore will I also \w diminish|strong="H1639"\w* \add thee;\add* neither shall mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w spare|strong="H2347"\w*, neither will I have any \w pity|strong="H2550"\w*.

¶ A third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* of thee shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* with the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, and with \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* shall they be \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee: and a third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* thee; and I will \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* a third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* into all the \w winds|strong="H7307"\w*, and I will draw \w out|strong="H7324"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them.

Thus shall mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* be \w accomplished|strong="H3615"\w*, and I will cause my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* to \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* upon them, and I will be \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w*: and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add* in my \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w*, when I have \w accomplished|strong="H3615"\w* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* in them.

Moreover I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w waste|strong="H2723"\w*, and a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* thee, in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all that pass \w by|strong="H5674"\w*.

So it shall be a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* and a \w taunt|strong="H1422"\w*, an \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* and an \w astonishment|strong="H4923"\w* unto the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* thee, when I shall \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* in thee in \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and in \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* and in \w furious|strong="H2534"\w* \w rebukes|strong="H8433"\w*. I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.

When I shall \w send|strong="H7971"\w* upon them the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* of \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, which shall be for \add their\add* \w destruction|strong="H4889"\w*, \add and\add* which I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* you: and I will \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* upon you, and will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* your \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*:

So will I \w send|strong="H7971"\w* upon you \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* and \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w*, and they shall \w bereave|strong="H7921"\w* thee; and \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* and \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* thee; and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon thee. I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.
